text.tspan: sent that let's the sent and
what is this game and how you play it ?
it's a turn based multiplayer game for two players
(can be for more than 2 , but I intend to implement
for 2) you start with a board full of dots and in each
the plaeyer should click on a line between two dots
so it shows on the screen. if in your turn you comlete
a square you conguer it , and it become your terretory
and what inside the square becomes yours (there is
nothing now inside the squares in the illustration on
the left but there will be in the real game), also if you
complete a square in your turn you get another turn
and continue to play, the things inside the squares are
stuff that give you money: for example a chest of gold
that give you a certain amount of money instantly
after you find it, and a factory that each turn gives
you a certain amount of money.
the game is finished when all the squares are conqured
and the winner is the player that has the biggest amount
of money, if they have the same amount it's a draw!
this game is inspired by this game on y8:
the game will be implemented using python: pygame, socket, _thread
